snippet: The Sochi Olympics should not be a reason to ignore the country’s soul-crushing repression.
abstract: Editorial contends the Russia led by Pres Vladimir V Putin conflicts starkly with Olympic ideals and fundamental human rights; underscores the importance of the world speaking out against the excesses of the Russian government while it is at the center of the world's attention.
